{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Nighthawk AX8 Smart WiFi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/RAX80.aspx |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/RAX80 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = RAX80 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (Nighthawk AX8)<!--(Jaguar)--> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX60002R |series = Nighthawk AX |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY318200414 |icid = 4054A-18200414 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = U12H376 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-04 Z2AW; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N04GVSIAA; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GU6MB-12; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Broadcom;BCM54612E;BCM54162E, B1KMLG, TE1812 P21, 000 3 W; |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 14:59:C0 |oui = 14:59:C0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.1;aarch64;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.16 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, VHT160, HE160, Link Aggregation, LACP, MU-MIMO, DFS (master/slave), fan, |addchip = 2.4GHz High-Power WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz High-Power WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H376 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/21/2018 |estreldate = 11/07/2018 |estprice = 400 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01MQDZXA4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1821 P21, 4410-01 B2 W 000; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 1148 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1821 P21, 4410-01 B2 W 000; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <small> This router was initially referred to as the '''Nighthawk X12''' in FCC documents :but it has been released as the '''Netgear Nighthawk AX8 (RAX80)'''.
Software/Firmware Version is listed as "Linux 4.1 (aarch64) 17.10.25.3" :in the ''Test Report (DFS)_rev 3'' FCC document. </small> {{FCC ST|02/18/2019|indexme.}} *Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33217-first-wifi6-peek-asus-rt-ax88u-netgear-rax80 ''First Peek At Wi-Fi 6: ASUS RT-AX88U & Netgear RAX80'' on '''SNB'''] *[https://www.techbang.com/posts/63813-ring-80211ax-wi-fi-6-gate-netgear-nighthawk-ax8-rax80-wireless-network-router-measurement?page=1 ''802.11ax/Wi-Fi 6 Netgear Nighthawk AX8 RAX80'' on '''TechBang'''] (CN) :SoC: [[Broadcom]] BCM4908 ARM 64-bit (Cortex-B35) @1.8GHz :RAM: 2x [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646E-BYMA (1GB DDR3-1866) :Flash: [[Winbond]] W29N04GVSIAA (4Gb NAND MLC) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43684 (2x 2.4/5GHz) :FEM: [[Skyworks]] SKY85331-11 (4x 2.4GHz) ::[[Skyworks]] SKY85743-21 (4x 5GHz) :LAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM54612E (GbE PHY) :OEM: [[Foxconn]] U12H376
===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-jaguar-nighthawk-x12-ax6000-wireless-router.48488/ ''Netgear Jaguar (Nighthawk X12) AX6000 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums]
===News=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13325/netgear-announces-nighthawk-rax80-rax120 ''Netgear Announces Nighthawk RAX80 and RAX120'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.broadcom.com/company/news/product-releases/2366450 ''802.11ax Max Wi-Fi Access Point SoC'' on '''Broadcom'''] *[https://24wireless.info/netgear-11ax-jaguar-fcc ''Netgear Jaguar (Nighthawk X12) '' on '''24wireless.info'''] *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''24wireless.info''']
==See also== :[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Netgear RAX40 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX3000 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX40) *Netgear RAX80 (Nighthawk AX8) - AX6000 • ''Jaguar'' AX8 (RAX80) *[[Netgear RAX120 (Nighthawk AX12)]] - AX6000 • ''Leopard'' (RAX120) *[[Netgear RAX200 (Nighthawk Tri-Band AX12)]] - AX11000 (RAX200)
